# India

## Overview

India is the world's most populous country and the seventh-largest by land area. It is the world's largest democracy and a federal parliamentary republic.

## Key Facts

- **Capital**: New Delhi
- **Official Languages**: Hindi, English (22 scheduled languages)
- **Currency**: Indian Rupee
- **Government**: Federal parliamentary republic
- **GDP**: $3.7 trillion (2023)

## Geography

India occupies most of the South Asian subcontinent. It features the Himalayan mountain range in the north, the Thar Desert in the west, and extensive coastlines along the Arabian Sea and Bay of Bengal.

## Economy

India has the world's fifth-largest economy by nominal GDP. Major sectors include IT services, agriculture, textiles, and pharmaceuticals. It is one of the fastest-growing major economies.
